name: Fired Up! (PapaCashew, Jeff)
description:
Have you ever wanted to be an a**hole? Well this game lets you do just that. You take control of a slimy old fat f... friend working in an office. Who can't seem to get a raise for the life of him. So he makes the only logical conclusion - get his fellow coworkers fired so additional funds open up.

The game was made for ZenoJam 6. In 1 week.

Jinsah - 3D Artist

PapaCashew - Developer
